definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack
animal hide/leather/to reform/to remove/to expel (from office)

sentences.english: Just met Zhao Chuanji wear suits to the street.
sentences.chinese: 到街上剛好碰見趙傳奇穿的西裝革履。

sentences.english: On the way we all highly praised a young man in western-style clothes and leather shoes who was riding by.
sentences.chinese: 路上我們都高度讚揚了一名年輕男子西裝革履的騎着。

sentences.english: A well-dressed Asian man has just been shot by two Americans.
sentences.chinese: 一個西裝革履的亞洲人剛剛被兩個被國人殺了。

sentences.english: Almost without exception, today's Chinese leaders wear Western business suits.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎想都不用想，今天的中國領導人都是西裝革履。
